meanings.definition: A person who engages in something.
meanings.sent1: The engager at the meeting shared interesting ideas.
meanings.sent2: The engager in the group discussion was very active.
meanings.sent3: The engager at the party told funny jokes to keep everyone entertained.
meanings.sent4: She was the engager of the team, always bringing people together.
meanings.sent5: The engager in the class was known for their friendly and approachable nature.

meanings.definition: To attract or hold the attention of someone.
meanings.sent1: The magician used his tricks to engager the audience.
meanings.sent2: The speaker was able to engager the crowd with her powerful speech.
meanings.sent3: The puppy tried to engager the cat by playfully chasing its tail.
meanings.sent4: The painting seemed to engager all who passed by, drawing them in with its vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The music was so captivating that it could engager even the most distracted listener.

meanings.definition: To participate in an activity or event.
meanings.sent1: She decided to engager in the charity run to support a good cause.
meanings.sent2: The students were eager to engager in the science experiment.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried to engager in the bird's nest-building activity, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: The community came together to engager in the annual festival, celebrating their traditions.
meanings.sent5: He was excited to engager in the dance competition, showcasing his skills on stage.
